price: 27. Uga warran qisada labadii wiil ee Aadam oo xaq ah; markay labaduba bixiyeen qurbaan ee laga aqbalay midkood*, oo aan laga aqbalin kii kale*. (Qaabiil) wuxuu (ku) yidhi (Haabiil): Waan ku dili. (Haabiil) wuxuu yidhi: Sideedaba wuxuu Alle wax ka aqbalaa kuwa dhowrsoon ee u hoggaansan.
arabic: ۞ وَٱتۡلُ عَلَيۡهِمۡ نَبَأَ ٱبۡنَيۡ ءَادَمَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ إِذۡ قَرَّبَا قُرۡبَانٗا فَتُقُبِّلَ مِنۡ أَحَدِهِمَا وَلَمۡ يُتَقَبَّلۡ مِنَ ٱلۡأٓخَرِ قَالَ لَأَقۡتُلَنَّكَۖ قَالَ إِنَّمَا يَتَقَبَّلُ ٱللَّهُ مِنَ ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ
footnotes:
*Waa Haabiil, oo ahaa xoolaley isagoo la baxay xoolihiisii inta u fiican sadaqo ahaan).
*Qaabiil, oo ahaa beeralay isagoo la baxay dalaggiisii  inta u xun.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ut'lu ʿalayhim naba-a ib'nay ādama bil-ḥaqi idh qarrabā qur'bānan fatuqubbila min aḥadihimā walam yutaqabbal mina al-ākhari qāla la-aqtulannaka qāla innamā yataqabbalu al-lahu mina al-mutaqīna
